issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing Text Field I noticed that launching Border Style from a landscape mode is not bringing a Soft Keyboard as expected.

It is not a regression, occurs on 2.0.2 as well

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KS - Text Field - Border Style in a landscape mode.

Actual result:
The Keyboard does not appear on a screen.

Expected result:
The Keyboard should appear.
fields.summary: Android: Text Field  -  A Soft Keyboard does not appear.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206131907
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120613210250
Galaxy Nexus 4.0.2/ 4.0.4

comments.body:
The problem reproduces with the release 3.0.2 and master version 3.1.0

Titanium Studio, build:  2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 (02/03/2013)
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 (02/03/2013)
Device: Samsung galaxy s duos Android version: 4.0.4

This issue still exists:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201302191606
Titanium SDK, build 3.1.0.v20130303194855
Devices:
Nexus4 Android version: 4.2
Nexus GalaxyS3 Android version: 4.0.4

Note: Can not reproduce on Nexus7 Android version 4.2

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/api/Titanium.UI.TextField-property-borderStyle
According to docs this property does not apply  for Android.

Speaking of keyboard, it appears when focus in a text field.
Closing as invalid.
Tested 
KS version 3.3.0
<guid>cd4da554-3d80-44ca-b712-a7acfd304973</guid>
